originalText.text: Dr Toscano is an amazing surgeon and dentist. I highly recommend him. I had my lips and smile makeover done by him. His staff is so loving and make you feel like family. Dr T makes you very relaxed and painless. He treats most of the models in NYC and came highly recommended from my agency and many of my model friends. I love Dr T and wouldn’t go to anyone else

Dr T makes you very relaxed and painless. He treats most of the models in NYC and came highly recommended from my agency and many of my model friends. I love Dr T and wouldn’t go to anyone else

originalText.text: Dr. Toscano is a great dentist and surgeon.  I had quite a bit of work that needed to be done on my gums and teeth.   I was very scared of going to the dentist and getting this done.  I went to other dentists and was not comfortable with them.  I finally went to Dr. Toscano and he immediately calmed me down and offered the best solution to my issues.  Surgery was quick and painless.  Recovery was almost a non issue.  He saved my teeth. And his staff is also very nice and friendly.  Highly recommended!  Thank you Dr. Toscano.

text.text: Dr. Toscano is a great dentist and surgeon.  I had quite a bit of work that needed to be done on my gums and teeth.   I was very scared of going to the dentist and getting this done.  I went to other dentists and was not comfortable with them.  I finally went to Dr. Toscano and he immediately calmed me down and offered the best solution to my issues.  Surgery was quick and painless.  Recovery was almost a non issue.  He saved my teeth. And his staff is also very nice and friendly.  Highly recommended!  Thank you Dr. Toscano.

originalText.text: Dr. Toscano is a subject matter expert in his field. He is thorough in his explanations of dental issues and fair in his proposed plans of action. Dr. Toscano is to-the-point and honest with his assessments and recommendations. I have been extremely happy with the results of all of my procedures under his care. He provides a high level of service, in a comfortable and friendly environment. I frequently recommend him to friends looking for an amazing dentist in Manhattan.

originalText.text:
Dr Toscano has been the go to dentist for our agency for the last 5 years. All his work has always been excellent and his whole staff has been amazing and professional.
From basic cleaning to mayor orthodontist work me and my 96 models of our boutique agency definitely recommend him.

originalText.text:
This was one of the best dentists I ever been to. I felt safe and very relaxed in his hands. I had 3 dental implants placed and a sinus lift. Completely pain free. He gave me his cell and
I can reach him 24/7 ... such a pleasure to be in his care. Highly recommend.
